data.title: Patti Labelle
data.meta_description: Get the latest patti labelle news, articles, videos and photos on the New York Post.
data.text:
On Patti LaBelle's 80th, I remember her horrific-smelling hotel room

People magazine reprising Patti LaBelle turning 80 made me remember our long-ago interview in a NYC hotel. She lived good. Six-inch spike heels, 3,000 pairs.

Queen of soft rock? Mary J. Blige reveals early bond to Elton John ahead of Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction

Queen of Hip-Hop Soul Mary J. Blige reveals the real love for soft rock that helped lead her to the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame in 2024.

Patti LaBelle forgets lyrics during Tina Turner tribute at 2023 BET Awards

Patti LaBelle gave a tribute to the late Tina Turner at the 2023 BET Awards Sunday night -- though she struggled with the lyrics.

Music legend rushed off stage after bomb threat during concert

Patti LaBelle was rushed off stage in the middle of a Milwaukee show Saturday night after the venue was hit with a bomb threat.

Patti LaBelle has just a few upcoming concerts. We found cheap tickets

Patti LaBelle has just 10 concerts on her tour calendar in 2022 and 2023. We found all the best prices for each and every show on her brief tour schedule.

Ranking the Top 10 best girl groups: The Spice Girls to the Ronettes

After the death of Ronettes legend Ronnie Spector on Jan. 12, we rank the Top 10 girl groups of all time, from the Supremes to the Pussycat Dolls.

Sarah Dash, of 'Lady Marmalade' fame with Patti LaBelle, dead at 76

“We were just onstage together on Saturday and it was such a powerful and special moment,” LaBelle, 77, said Monday evening.

Hitmaker Diane Warren spills secrets about working with Cher, Whitney

Titanic tunesmith Diane Warren reflects on working with Aerosmith, Toni Braxton, Céline Dion and more, ahead of her debut album, “Diane Warren: The Cave Sessions, Vol. 1,” out Friday.

Patti LaBelle is always ready to cook on the go

Patti LaBelle is also a chef who knocks off hotpot meals to hotshot eaters. Like 4 a.m. making Wyclef Jean burgers, fries and onion rings. She’s now reissuing her 20-year-old cookbook “LaBelle Cuisine.”

'The Masked Singer': The Flower is the show's biggest reveal yet

"The Masked Singer" revealed a big name with the unveiling of the Flower on the show. Warning: Spoilers ahead from Wednesday night’s episode of the star-studded competition.

Patti LaBelle wants a husband — and her Tupperware back from Elton John

Patti LaBelle doesn’t want a boyfriend — she wants a husband. The Godmother of Soul is 75-years-old, but she’s not given up on finding true love. “I still have time...

Two million pounds of sweet potatoes. That's what it's going to take to get Patti LaBelle's suddenly famous sweet potato pie back onto shelves at Wal-Mart. Which means the pie...

Patti LaBelle to young pop stars: 'Put some clothes on!'

Iconic singer Patti LaBelle sat front row at the Zang Toi fashion show last week — but she saved her front-row shade for barely dressed female pop stars. “You know,...

Trump: 'Celeb Apprentice' contestants 'the meanest by far'

Donald Trump says he’s as surprised as everyone else that “Celebrity Apprentice” has returned so strongly — almost two years since its last season. “I think what happened is that...
